TextView.android:text: The rare delicacy- Malai Roti attains a distinct taste owing to the use of cardamom and spices, like- mace (Javitri) and nutmeg (Jaiphal).Contrary to its name, this Malai Roti prepared by draining the liquid from Malai (milk cream) and simply given the shape of Roti (bread), shallow-fried fried in pure Desi Ghee (clarified butter), soaked in the sugar syrup (Chashani) and garnished with saffron strands, dry-fruits, like- pistachio, almonds etc.is a rare sweet delicacy.
